snippet: A military wife confronts the possibility of divorce and looks back on the signs of strain and the options available for help.
abstract: A military wife confronts the possibility of divorce and looks back on the signs of strain and the options available for help.
lead_paragraph: I entered marriage believing that the word divorce would never be a part of my vocabulary. I had no doubt that my husband and I could weather whatever ups and downs marriage threw at us. I believed that there was nothing we couldn't conquer together.

headline.main: Keeping Marriage From Becoming a Casualty of War
